Description: Deploys AllInOne kubernetes+contrail nodes, into an existing VPC and subnets, for federation testing

AvailabilityZone1.Description: AWS Availability Zone For the nodes

ContrailCommandPrivateSNGatewayIP.ConstraintDescription: parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x
ContrailCommandPrivateSNGatewayIP.Description: Private Network Gateway IP used by Contrail Command to reach the other nodes

DeployContrailCommand.Description: if true we will deploy contrail command

UserLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used for OAM access to CC and if running HA the load balancer, both on internet. Typically your laptop /32. If left blank we will add 0.0.0./0 and allow ssh from anywhere
UserLocation.ConstraintDescription: Put your Client IP here x.x.x.x/32, if you leave it blank then 0.0.0.0/0 will be populated and the internet will be able access your deployments UI and SSH

SGSubnet1.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the cluster.

SGSubnet2.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet3.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet4.Description: AN IP address range allowed in security to point towards the controller cluster. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

idVPC.Description: Existing VPCid where the nodes will sit

idPrivateSubnet1.Description: Existing Private Subnet 1 id for the nodes

k8sPodBaseIP.Description: Used as the base addess for the POD IPAM, the host ip last digit is transposed into the third digit to ensure the subnet is unique per instance

k8sServiceBaseIP.Description: Used as the base addess for the POD IPAM, the host ip last digit is transposed into the third digit to ensure the subnet is unique per instance

k8sFabricBaseIP.Description: Used as the base addess for the Fabric IPAM, the host ip last digit is transposed into the third digit to ensure the subnet is unique per instance

k8sFabricSN.Description: The subnet vrouters are allowed to accept tunnels on. this is proabably your VPC subnet. It ends up in config->global parameter->Fabric Subnets

k8sBaseASN.Description: The controller ASN base, 4-bytes, the host ip last digit is added to this in order to create a unique ASN per instances

k8sVersion.Description: Kubernetes version to install, default is 1.18.9

InstallerBGitHubInstallerLocation.Description: The location  to use if Github is selected

InstallerCS3Location.Description: The location  to use if Github is selected

NodeMTU.Description: MTU for the Nodes. Usefull for VPN gateways, which might need a sub 1500 MTU

NumberOfClusters.Description: Number of AllInOne Contrail+K8s clusters to deploy in the auto scaling group

DebugLogs.Description: if true we will enable SYS_DEBUG in the contrail cni

TestPod.Description: if true we deploy a test pod into each node for you

FullMesh.Description: if true controllers are bgp meshed

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Contrail Comand, public and on internet

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the node1 UI
allow access to the node2 UI
allow access to the node3 UI
allow access to the node3 UI
allow access to the Contrail Comand UI
allow ssh access to AllInOne node

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Contrail 1 Instances on the Private SN

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow access to the Contrail Command Private IP

Properties.Description: allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet1
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet2
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet3
allow inbound traffic to the controllers from a specified subnet subnet4
